text: Lesley Rene Stahl (born December 16, 1941) is an American television journalist. Since 1991, she has reported for CBS on 60 Minutes. Stahl was born in Lynn, Massachusetts. She was raised in Swampscott, Massachusetts. ==References== ==Other websites== *CBS biography * *NNDb entry for Lesley Stahl *Lesley Stahl at wowOwow Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Journalists from Massachusetts Category:People from Lynn, Massachusetts
title: Lesley Stahl
